2019500.name: of pawns & kings Demo
2019500.description:
This first demo is a work in progress version of the 3rd chapter of the game "of pawns & kings". Many things are nearly final, but especially the characters and animations will be improved toward the final game. It is fully voiced in german and english ( the german speakers spoke the english voices for this demo, too. The final game will get native speakers ). We hope it gives a good first impression on the look and feel of our dream project.
We really hope you will enjoy this first demo !
Ingo
2019500.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
